LanguageData.TrailblazerAStarDesc: Standard A* with a straight line distance heuristic
LanguageData.TrailblazerHAStarDesc: A variant of A* that uses a second round of Reverse Resumable A* pathing on the region grid as the heuristic
LanguageData.TrailblazerTwinAStarDesc: A variant of A* that uses a second round of Reverse Resumable A* that only accounts for terrain cost as the heuristic
